casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos RODRIGUEZ. No. 302A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 22, 2016. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Jennifer Martin, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Patrick B. Weede, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Michael Silver, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of February 2016 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

*805"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of February 2016."
